gameInstalled.title: Game đã được cài đặt
gameInstalled.description: Game đã được cài đặt thành công!

gameUpdated.title: Game đã được update
gameUpdated.description: Game đã được update thành công

gameDeleted.title: Game đã được xóa
gameDeleted.description: Game đã được xóa thành công... (tại saaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaao)

foundUpdate.title: Bản cập nhật mới!
foundUpdate.description: Trình khởi chạy đã tìm được bản cập nhật mới cho Game

levelRated.title: Your level was rated
levelRated.description-1: Congratulations! Your level %1$s was rated with %2$s star 🎉
levelRated.description-2: Congratulations! Your level %1$s was rated with %2$s stars 🎉
levelRated.description-3: Congratulations! Your level %1$s was rated with %2$s stars 🎉

unbanned.title: You were unbanned
unbanned.description-0: You were unbanned in unknown for launcher thing! 🥳
unbanned.description-1: You were unbanned from players leaderboard! 🥳
unbanned.description-2: You were unbanned from creators leaderboard! 🥳
unbanned.description-3: Moderator unbanned uploading levels to you! 🥳
unbanned.description-4: Moderator unbanned commenting levels to you! 🥳

banned.title: You were banned
banned.description-0: You were banned in unknown for launcher thing! 😭
banned.description-1: You were banned from players leaderboard! 😭
banned.description-2: You were banned from creators leaderboard! 😭
banned.description-3: Moderator banned uploading levels to you! 😭
banned.description-4: Moderator banned commenting levels to you! 😭

third.title: New clan join request
third.description: Someone sent join request to your clan %1$s! 😊

left.title: Someone left clan
left.description: One of members of your clan %1$s left it! 😔

fifth.title: You were kicked
fifth.description: You were kicked from clan %1$s by its owner! 😔

accepted.title: Join request was accepted
accepted.description: Owner of clan %1$s accepted your join request! 😀

denied.title: Join request was denied
denied.description: Owner of clan %1$s denied your join request! 😥

notifications.title: Thông báo
notifications.description: Thông báo khi có bản cập nhật mới cho Game/trình khởi chạy, thông báo liên quan tới Game, v.v

profileType.title: Kiểu hồ sơ
profileType.description: Chọn kiểu hồ sơ sẽ xuất hiện khi bạn xem nó

language.title: Ngôn ngữ
language.description: Lựa chọn ngôn ngữ mà bạn biết! (Ừa thật đấy)

accentColor.title: System color
accentColor.description: Should launcher use accent color or keep default one

gameFolder.title: Folder của game
gameFolder.description: Mở folder của game (cho mấy thanh niên cài geode hoặc Megahack, tùy)

filesIntegrity.title: Kiểm tra độ toàn vẹn
filesIntegrity.description: Kiểm tra độ toàn vẹn (thường dùng khi game gặp vấn đề)

deleteGame.title: Xóa game
deleteGame.description: Xóa game ra khỏi máy tính. Nghĩ kỹ trước khi làm

updatesInterval.title: Checking updates
updatesInterval.description: How often launcher will check game updates

error.unexpectedError: Lỗi không lường trước được (bất ngờ chưa)
